extendedInfo.description: The flesh eating zombies are here and are invading your city!Choose your weapon of zombie destruction - from the Lightning Bolt Blitz to The Death Ray! - and unleash the wrath on the walking dead. You are the only one that can stop the invasion in Cartoon City!Fast and fun gameplay, makes Bad Zombie - Monster Run the must-play new game!Features:-Exciting and fast gameplay-Collect coins and unlock all the weapons -Choose your weapons of zombie destruction -With Gamecenter support, beat your friends and see who can get the highest score-Loads of fun!
